attributes.action: teenagers should have more facilites to use
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think teenagers like myself should have more centres and parks to go and use because we get very bored and where i  live in chelmsley wood birmingham there isnt many facilites near us so we would all like to have more facilites like youth centres and more places to hang out and meet our mates instead of by the corner shop causing havoc in the streets.
